>>t=[0:1/600:1/120];
>> exacta_y=dsolve('D4y+24*y+22*Dy-7*D2y-4*D3y=6*sin(t)^3-80*t*exp(3*t)+12*exp(3*t)','y(0)=12','Dy(0)=17','D2y(0)=26','D3y(0)=41')
 
exacta_y =
 
(52*exp(3*t))/25 + (16*t*exp(3*t))/5 + exp(3*t)*((65^(1/2)*1625^(1/2))/26000 - (9*17^(1/2)*425^(1/2))/34000 + 251/20) - exp(-2*t)*((3*17^(1/2)*425^(1/2))/8500 - (3*65^(1/2)*1625^(1/2))/84500 + 271/75) + exp(-t)*((9*17^(1/2)*425^(1/2))/6800 - (9*65^(1/2)*1625^(1/2))/130000 + 157/20) - exp(4*t)*((3*65^(1/2)*1625^(1/2))/162500 - (3*17^(1/2)*425^(1/2))/28900 + 109/15) - (9*425^(1/2)*cos(t + atan(16/13)))/1700 + exp(-t)*((2*exp(4*t))/5 - t*exp(4*t)) + (1625^(1/2)*cos(3*t + atan(28/29)))/6500 - exp(3*t)*(- 2*t^2 + (3*t)/5)
 
>> exacta=double(subs(exacta_y,t))

exacta =

     1.200000000000000e+01
     1.202836947598230e+01
     1.205681136262703e+01
     1.208532584619888e+01
     1.211391311056612e+01
     1.214257333717477e+01

>> [t,w]=ode45(@g_ej41,t,[12;17;26;41])

t =
